title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #96
body:
## Date and Time

Oct 25, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [EIP-4844 Implementers' Call #1](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/647) [Notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15EatedrJanNxBZGPVASvwq9xgbTs5UxjsDfjpM6ppSY/edit#heading=h.mat4jp8l6adl)
- [Shanghai](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md) & [Capella](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/capella)
- [Shanghai page](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/shanghai_upgrade/index.html) at ECH website

- A CNBC piece on Proof of Stake went live this weekend and links can be found [here](https://www.cnbc.com/2022/10/22/how-ethereums-merge-made-crypto-mining-more-sustainable.html) on the site, and [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6lNgLNnfSoQ&t=350s) on YouTube!
   
### 2. Events & hackathon
- Devcon Recap
- [ETHIndia](https://ethindia.co/) Dec 2nd - 4th, 2022
- [ETH Denver](https://www.ethdenver.com/) Feb 24- March 05, 2023

### 3. New initiative/association
- MGD & ConsenSys Fellowship Mentorship
- Decentralized meeting - Huddle01

### 4. ECH updates
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6504 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 1314 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 2789 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 249 Followers
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
   - Pull Request](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/pulls)
   - [Issues](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
     - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/74
     - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/72
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - Learn2Earn [App](https://l2e.ethereumcatherders.com/), [GitHub](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH GitHub backup & [YouTube backup](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/ECHBackup)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) WIP [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com/#/) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [Agenda 148](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/624)
  - Consensus meeting [Agenda 97](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/630)
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting, agenda [68](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/187)    
     - Change of time - EIPIP @15:00 UTC
     - For Standard Track EIP of _ERC_ Category, should the documentation be EIP-20 or ERC-20 (for example)?

**Other community meetings**
    -  EIP Editing Office Hour [Announcement](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/introducing-eip-editing-office-hour-9f04a95a26ba)  [Meeting 4 Recording](https://youtu.be/lYJNHM_5vCM)
  - KZG-Ceremony Breakout Call # 9 [Recording](https://youtu.be/a8XoKo2-Q7c)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 95](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20095.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - Nov 08, 2022. 

 (Anything else, leave a comment.)
